actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Committee on Agriculture. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1036 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to improve the coordination of the rural development efforts of the Department of Agriculture, and to increase the rural development efforts of the Rural Electrification Administration, and for other purposes.
short_title: Rural Monitoring and Assistance Act of 1989

summary.text: Rural Monitoring and Assistance Act of 1989 - Amends the Rural Development Act of 1972 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to: (1) study and evaluate the needs of economically distressed rural counties; and (2) report annually to the appropriate congressional committees in each of FY 1990 through 1993 on the evaluation of county needs for rural development assistance. Authorizes appropriations. Directs the Secretary to prepare and submit to the appropriate congressional committees a report regarding coordination improvements in various Federal rural development activities.

titles.title: Rural Monitoring and Assistance Act of 1989

A bill to improve the coordination of the rural development efforts of the Department of Agriculture, and to increase the rural development efforts of the Rural Electrification Administration, and for other purposes.
